resources.string:
Happily is a simple Android experiment that uses Google's Mobile Vision API to detect if the user is smiling.
If yes, it changes background and loads a quote from happyapi.co.

External libraries used:
- MaterialProgressBar by Zhang Hai shared under Apache 2.0.

Experiment by Paolo Rotolo. Full source code is available on my GitHub.
https://github.com/paolorotolo
Smile to get your\ndaily happy quote :)
We need camera permission to detect your smile :)
You can\'t use Happily without camera. Please restart the app and allow camera permission.
